steps.title: Look carefully at your girl.
steps.content: Look carefully at your girl. Make sure you are satisfied with her appearance before going in for the clothes.

steps.title: Draw a small loop at the base of her neck like you were going to draw a shirt.
steps.content: Draw a small loop at the base of her neck like you were going to draw a shirt.

steps.title: When you get to the bottom of the shirt design, keep going.
steps.content: When you get to the bottom of the shirt design, keep going.

steps.title: Make your lines swoop out.
steps.content: Make your lines swoop out. Close them at the bottom.

steps.title: Add some slightly curved lines going down the dress to create folds or ripples in the cloth.
steps.content: Add some slightly curved lines going down the dress to create folds or ripples in the cloth.

steps.title: Draw a simple dress
steps.content: Draw a simple dress . Learning to draw a simple dress will serve as a good basis when moving to more complicated drawings.

steps.title: Draw a couture dress
steps.content: Draw a couture dress . A couture dress is slightly more unique than a simple dress, but still easy to draw. They are often worn at more formal occasions, such as weddings, balls, and proms.

steps.title: Draw a gown
steps.content: Draw a gown . Drawing a gown requires many of the same techniques as drawing a couture dress, except that a gown is generally longer.

steps.title: Draw an outfit
steps.content: Draw an outfit . Once you are able to comfortably draw a dress, challenge yourself by combining it with other accessories.
